org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel

Class CachedChildrenTreeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel.CachedChildrenTreeModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsynchronousModelFilter, Model, TreeModel

    public abstract class CachedChildrenTreeModel
extends Object
implements TreeModel, AsynchronousModelFilter
    A TreeModel, which caches children objects and allow seamless update of children objects.
    Since:
    1.49

      • asynchronous

        public Executor asynchronous(Executor original,
                             AsynchronousModelFilter.CALL asynchCall,
                             Object node)
                      throws UnknownTypeException
        Description copied from interface: AsynchronousModelFilter
        Change the threading information for view models method calls. The returned Executor is used to call methods identified by AsynchronousModelFilter.CALL enum.
        Specified by:
        asynchronous in interface AsynchronousModelFilter
        Parameters:
        original - The original Executor
        asynchCall - Identification of the method call
        node - Object node
        Returns:
        an instance of Executor
        Throws:

      • getChildren

        public final Object[] getChildren(Object o,
                                  int from,
                                  int to)
                           throws UnknownTypeException
        Description copied from interface: TreeModel
        Returns children for given parent on given indexes.

        This method works in pair with TreeModel.getChildrenCount(java.lang.Object), the to parameter is up to the value that is returned from TreeModel.getChildrenCount(java.lang.Object). If the list of children varies over time, the implementation code needs to pay attention to bounds and check the from and to parameters, especially if TreeModel.getChildrenCount(java.lang.Object) returns Integer.MAX_VALUE. Caching of the children between TreeModel.getChildrenCount(java.lang.Object) and TreeModel.getChildren(java.lang.Object, int, int) can be used as well, if necessary.

        Specified by:
        getChildren in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        o - a parent of returned nodes
        from - a start index
        to - a end index
        Returns:
        children for given parent on given indexes
        Throws:
        UnknownTypeException - if this TreeModel implementation is not able to resolve children for given node type
        See Also:
        TreeModel.getChildrenCount(java.lang.Object)

      • computeChildren

        protected abstract Object[] computeChildren(Object node)
                                     throws UnknownTypeException
        Compute the children nodes. This is called when there are no children cached for this node only.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to compute the children for
        Returns:
        The list of children
        Throws:
        UnknownTypeException - When this implementation is not able to resolve children for given node type

      • cacheChildrenOf

        protected boolean cacheChildrenOf(Object node)
        Can be overridden to decide which nodes to cache and which not.
        Parameters:
        node - The node
        Returns:
        true when the children of this node should be cached, false otherwise. The default implementation returns true always.

      • refreshCache

        protected final void refreshCache(Object node)
        Force a refresh of the cache.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to refresh the cache for.

      • clearCache

        protected final void clearCache()
        Clear the entire cache.

      • reorder

        protected Object[] reorder(Object[] nodes)
        Allows to reorder the children. This is called each time the children are requested, even when they're cached.
        Parameters:
        nodes - The original nodes returned by computeChildren(java.lang.Object) or by the cache.
        Returns:
        The reordered nodes. The default implementation returns the original nodes.

      • recomputeChildren

        protected final void recomputeChildren()
                                throws UnknownTypeException
        Force to recompute all cached children.
        Throws:
        UnknownTypeException - When this implementation is not able to resolve children for some node type

      • recomputeChildren

        protected final void recomputeChildren(Object node)
                                throws UnknownTypeException
        Force to recompute children cached for the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to recompute the children for
        Throws:
        UnknownTypeException - When this implementation is not able to resolve children for the given node type
